metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:1124-1 -- Recommended update for suse-ami-tools
metadata.description:
This update provides the following fixes and enhancements:
* Fix the OBS and IBS targets for suse-ami-tools * Add motd files for openSUSE 13.1, 12.3 and 12.2 * Remove motd files for no longer supported openSUSE 11.4 * Fix the repo path for WebYaST for SLE 11 SP3 * Create repo setup for 32 bit SLE 11 SP3 * Add OBS target to Makefile to update the OBS project * Add support for SLE11 SP3.

extend_definition.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11.x is installed
